sentences.english: President Obama and Prime Minister Rudd also discussed climate change, with Mr.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统与陆克文总理还讨论了气候变化问题。

sentences.english: We would give Rudd information to use against Brereton, and he would use it.
sentences.chinese: 我们将给陆克文信息来对付布里尔顿，他会使用它。

sentences.english: Gillard's Apricot Kernels will be short-lived, with Rudd due to return to Artificial Turf late Thursday.
sentences.chinese: 但吉拉德的升职只是短暂的，陆克文周四晚就会回国。

sentences.english: The Australian people are way ahead of the Rudd government and the Turnbull opposition.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚人民前进的陆克文政府和特恩布尔反对。

sentences.english: Also the same day, Jordanian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd held talks with Bakhit.
sentences.chinese: 陆克文当天还同约旦首相巴希特举行了会谈。

sentences.english: Overall, Rudd's room for policy maneuver is limited.
sentences.chinese: 总之，陆克文的政策机动空间是有限的。

sentences.english: A Democratic Washington would find Rudd more on its wavelength than Howard.
sentences.chinese: 民主党控制的华盛顿将发现陆克文比霍华德更协调。

sentences.english: Gillard"s elevation will be short-lived, with Rudd due to return to Australia late Thursday."
sentences.chinese: 但吉拉德的升职只是短暂的，陆克文周四晚就会回国。

sentences.english: Some have accused Mr Rudd of being the leaker, but he has denied being the source.
sentences.chinese: 有人指责陆克文先生的泄密者，但他否认自己的来源。

sentences.english: In Australia, Prime Minister Kevin Rudd has vowed to restrictions on foreign real estate.
sentences.chinese: 在澳大利亚，总理陆克文已经发誓要限制外国人炒房。

sentences.english: President Obama and Prime Minister Rudd have discussed the situation by phone.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统和陆克文总理通过电话讨论了目前的状况。

sentences.english: Mr Rudd has issued a statement denying he is the source.
sentences.chinese: 陆克文曾发表声明，否认他是源。

sentences.english: Gillard was a party to every major decision of the Rudd government.
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德参与了陆克文政府的每一项重要决定。

sentences.english: Rudd earlier this year, to the dismay of the Labor Party faithful.
sentences.chinese: 陆克文搁置该计划令工党的忠实支持者大失所望。

sentences.english: Mr. Rudd says the Australian Defense Force will be built up to meet the challenge.
sentences.chinese: 陆克文表示，将加强澳大利亚国防力量，面对挑战。

sentences.english: Australian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd apologises for the past mistreatment of Aborigines.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚总理陆克文对过去虐待土著人致歉。
